t: How to Change Brand Name on Amazon
s: November 15, 2024 - Partner with experienced Amazon Seller Consulting professionals for ongoing support. Will my product reviews and ratings be impacted by a brand name change? No, your existing product reviews and ratings will remain intact after a brand name change.
